name: @tabler/icons
author: codecalm
description: A set of free MIT-licensed high-quality SVG icons for you to use in your web projects.

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run copy && pnpm run build:icons
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && find . ! -name '.gitkeep' -path '*/categories/*' -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf dist && find . ! -name '.gitkeep' -path '*/icons/*' -exec rm -rf {} +
